packages.install:
curl -LO "https://dl.google.com/go/go1.20.3.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm -rf ~/.local/go
tar -C ~/.local -xzf go1.20.3.linux-amd64.tar.gz
path=~/.local/go/bin
if ! echo "$PATH" | grep -qw "$path"; then
    echo "'$path' doesn't exist in \$PATH, add 'export PATH=\$PATH:$path' to you rc file"
fi
packages.name: go
